data.name: Mermail Abyssmegalo
data.desc: You can discard 2 other WATER monsters to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand. When Summoned this way: You can add 1 "Abyss-" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can Tribute 1 other Attack Position WATER monster; this card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
